meta.name: description
meta.value: Introduces one or more shortcuts for paginated reading.

parameter.name: shortcutCount
parameter.description: The total number of shortcuts we are trying to read

parameter.name: hasMultiplePages
parameter.description: Whether there is more than one page to read

parameter.name: pageSize
parameter.description: The number of shortcuts per page

parameter.name: appTitle
parameter.description: The app name the user queried about
